frontmatter.title: Japan OpenShift Commons Gathering 2020
frontmatter.lead_text: This Japan Regional OpenShift Commons Gathering will be delivered in Japanese on December 10th on Japan Standard Time!
frontmatter.info_text: The OpenShift Commons Gathering brings together experts from all over the world to discuss container technologies, best practices for cloud native application developers and the open source software projects that underpin the OpenShift ecosystem. This event will gather developers, devops professionals and sysadmins together to explore the next steps in making container technologies successful and secure.

schedule.session_name: Keynote: Welcome to the Commons - Diane Mueller, Director, Community Development (Red Hat)
Keynote: Enabling Innovation Everywhere: Red Hat's Hybrid Multi-Cloud Road Map -  Ashesh Badani, Senior Vice President, Cloud Platforms (Red Hat)
Guest Keynote Introductions - Takeshi Kaneko,Senior Director (Red Hat)
OpenShift AWS Case Study: Red Hat and AWS Partnersh-p Realizes Enterprise Class Computing Environment - Yasuhisa Abe, Sr. Manager, Strategic Alliance (Amazon Web Services)
NEC's Digital Transformation Initiatives: Towards the New Normal Era - Kimio Suganuma, Director, OSS Solution Center(NEC)
OpenShift as a Cloud Native Application Platform - Nobuhiro Sue, Application Services Specialist Solution Architect (Red Hat)
Optimal Solution to DX and Cloud Native with OpenShift and C-Native - Masahiro Ichimoto, CTC
Openshift, CI/CD Pipeline and the Challenge to High-Speed, High-Quality Software Development - Hiroyuki Kubota, Software Engineer (Mitsubishi Electric)
OpenShift and IBM Hybrid Cloud Strategy - Maho Takara, Cloud Solution Architect for IBM Cloud (IBM)
Realization of Safety and Security with Biometric Authentication/Video Analysis on OpenShift - Takashi Hisatomi, Manager,OSS Solution Center (NEC)
Future of Cloud Native and CI/CD - Shingo Kitayama (Red Hat)
Best Practice on API Management / Problems and Solutions - Yuichi Nakamura (Hitachi)
Video Analysis AI Platform on Openshift Connecting AI Servicers and Customers With MEC - Yu Sato (NTT)
Best Practice of OpenShift on Hybrid - Kei Omizo, Cloud Cloud Solution Architect (Microsoft)
Introducing HPE's On-Premise Infrastructure for OpenShift - Muneyasu Harada (Hewlett-Packard Enterprise)
Will you be an Certified Specialist in OpenShift? - Osamu Matsuhashi, Manager, Global Learning Services (Red Hat)
